mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.plan_year AS "planYear", a.check_num AS "checkNum", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.plan_status AS "planStatus", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", o4.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o4 ON o4.id = a.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bus_plan( id, plan_year, check_num, office_id, plan_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{planYear}, #{checkNum}, #{office.id}, #{planStatus}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bus_plan SET plan_year = #{planYear}, check_num = #{checkNum}, office_id = #{office.id}, plan_status = #{planStatus}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
